name: contingency_sell_buyer_property_cancel_days
title: Cancellation of buyer's property sale
label: Cancel Notification
description: If your contract to sell your property is cancelled, within how many days will you notify seller?
tips: Two (2) days is standard. Quick notification of cancellation is important to maintain good faith and allow the seller to make informed decisions.
small_print: Failure to notify within the specified timeframe may affect your rights under the purchase agreement.

internal.notes: Days to notify of property sale cancellation

contingency_sell_buyer_property_cancel_d.name: contingency_sell_buyer_property_cancel_days

suggested.hint: Giving notice within 3 days is advised.

contingency_sell_buyer_property_cancel_d.tooltip: Enter number of days for notification
